__e: Please talk to her see if you can.
If you're really a friend, you'll talk to him... and you'll have him come in and meet with me soon.
Go in there, talk to her and find out what's wrong.
Tell them about the time you thought you had a big head and then tell them what I said.
When the kid is old enough to understand, tell him both the good and the bad about me.
Tell him... Tell him about that thing that you won that you lost.
